plus.title: Plus Rank
plus.description: Get the plus rank for more cosmetic options, a special role in the discord server and support our mission.
plus.disclaimer: The subscription will be automatically renewed. You can cancel it at any time. All prices are are without VAT, according to ยง19 UStG. Terms and conditions apply.
plus.linkRequired: A Discord and Minecraft account is required to get the plus rank.
plus.successMessage: You have successfully subscribed to the plus rank. You can now use the plus rank in the Discord server and ingame. Thank you for your support!
